name: Ambi
biography: A black and purple dragoness with golden eyes and steeped in the arcane arts. She entered the tower to study its enchantments and learn its secrets...

specialtyClass.name: Vismaster
specialtyClass.description: A master of energy magic. Capable of storing energy to release it in a different form.

skills.name: Store Energy
skills.description: Absorb energy from your surroundings, gaining +5 Stored Energy.

skills.name: Transpose
skills.description: Convert your own energy into Stored Energy, losing 10 MP, and gaining +10 Stored Energy.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: Expend 5 Stored Energy all at once to spark a flame
